code: /* eslint-disable react-hooks/exhaustive-deps */import{useCallback}from"react";import{useToast}from"@chakra-ui/react";export var useMessage=function useMessage(){var toast=useToast();var showMessage=useCallback(function(props){var title=props.title,status=props.status;toast({title:title,status:status,position:"top",duration:2000,isClosable:true});},[]);return{showMessage:showMessage};};
